00061 SO_NODE_SOURCE(TLightShape);
00062 
00063 void TLightShape::initClass()
00064 {
00065         SO_NODE_INIT_CLASS(TLightShape, SoShape, "Shape");
00066 }
00067 
00068 TLightShape::TLightShape( )
00069 :m_heightElements( 0 ),
00070  m_lightAreaMatrix( 0 ),
00071  m_widthElements( 0 )
00072 {
00073         SO_NODE_CONSTRUCTOR(TLightShape);
00074         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( xMin, (-0.5) );
00075         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( xMax, (0.5) );
00076         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( zMin, (-0.5) );
00077         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( zMax, (0.5) );
00078         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( delta, (100.0) );
00079 }
00080 
00081 TLightShape::~TLightShape()
00082 {
00083         for( int i = 0; i < m_heightElements; i++ )
00084                 delete[] m_lightAreaMatrix[i];
00085         delete[] m_lightAreaMatrix;
00086 }
00087 
00088 double TLightShape::GetValidArea() const
00089 {
00090         int numberOfValidAreas = GetValidAreasCoord().count();
00091 
00092         double width =  xMax.getValue() - xMin.getValue();
00093         double pixelWidth = width / m_widthElements;
00094 
00095         double height = zMax.getValue() - zMin.getValue();
00096         double pixelHeight = height / m_heightElements;
00097 
00098         double validArea = ( pixelWidth * pixelHeight ) * numberOfValidAreas;
00099 
00100         return validArea;
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00108 QVector< QPair< int, int > > TLightShape::GetValidAreasCoord() const
00109 {
00110         QVector< QPair< int, int > > validAreasList;
00111 
00112         for( int i = 0; i < m_heightElements; i++ )
00113                 for( int j = 0; j < m_widthElements; j++ )
00114                         if( m_lightAreaMatrix[i][j] == 1 )      validAreasList.push_back( QPair< int, int >( i, j ) );
00115 
00116         return validAreasList;
00117 }
00118 
00119 Point3D TLightShape::Sample( double u, double v, int a, int b) const
00120 {   //calculate the coordinates of a photon un a cell
00121         return GetPoint3D( u, v,a,b );
00122 }
00123 
00124 Point3D TLightShape::GetPoint3D (double u, double v, int h,int w) const
00125 {
00126         if( OutOfRange( u, v ) )        tgf::SevereError("Function TLightShape::GetPoint3D called with invalid parameters" );
00127 
00128     //size of cells the sun is divided
00129         double width =  (xMax.getValue() - xMin.getValue())/m_widthElements;
00130         double height = (zMax.getValue() - zMin.getValue())/m_heightElements;
00131         //calculate the photon coordinate
00132         double x = xMin.getValue()+( u * width ) + (w*width);
00133         double z = zMin.getValue()+( v * height ) + (h*height);
00134 
00135         return Point3D( x, 0, z );
00136 }
00137 
00138 void TLightShape::SetLightSourceArea(  int h, int w, int** lightArea )
00139 {
00140 
00141         if( m_lightAreaMatrix != 0 )
00142         {
00143                 for( int i = 0; i < m_heightElements; i++ )
00144                         delete[] m_lightAreaMatrix[i];
00145                 delete[] m_lightAreaMatrix;
00146         }
00147 
00148         m_heightElements = h;
00149         m_widthElements = w;
00150         m_lightAreaMatrix = lightArea;
00151 }
00152 
00153 bool TLightShape::OutOfRange( double u, double v ) const
00154 {
00155         return ( ( u < 0.0 ) || ( u > 1.0 ) || ( v < 0.0 ) || ( v > 1.0 ) );
00156 }
00157 
00158 void TLightShape::computeBBox(SoAction*, SbBox3f& box, SbVec3f& /*center*/ )
00159 {
00160         // These points define the min and max extents of the box.
00161     SbVec3f min, max;
00162 
00163     min.setValue( xMin.getValue(), 0.0, zMin.getValue() );
00164     max.setValue( xMax.getValue(), 0.0, zMax.getValue() );
00165 
00166     // Set the box to bound the two extreme points.
00167     box.setBounds( min, max );
00168 
00169 }
00170 
00171 void TLightShape::generatePrimitives(SoAction *action)
00172 {
00173         SoPrimitiveVertex   pv;
00174         SoState  *state = action->getState();
00175 
00176         // See if we have to use a texture coordinate function,
00177         // rather than generating explicit texture coordinates.
00178         SbBool useTexFunc =  (SoTextureCoordinateElement::getType(state) == SoTextureCoordinateElement::FUNCTION);
00179 
00180         const SoTextureCoordinateElement* tce = 0;
00181         SbVec4f texCoord;
00182         if (useTexFunc) tce = SoTextureCoordinateElement::getInstance(state);
00183         else
00184         {
00185                 texCoord[2] = 0.0;
00186                 texCoord[3] = 1.0;
00187         }
00188 
00189         SbVec3f normal( 0.0, -1.0, 0.0 );
00190         beginShape(action, TRIANGLE_STRIP);
00191 
00192          //P1
00193          SbVec3f point( xMin.getValue(), 0.0, zMax.getValue() );
00194          if (useTexFunc )
00195                  texCoord = tce->get(point, normal);
00196          else
00197          {
00198                  texCoord[0] = 1.0;
00199                  texCoord[1] = 0.0;
00200          }
00201 
00202         pv.setPoint( point );
00203         pv.setNormal( normal );
00204         pv.setTextureCoords( texCoord );
00205         shapeVertex( &pv );
00206 
00207          //P2
00208         point = SbVec3f( xMin.getValue(), 0.0, zMin.getValue() );
00209 
00210          if (useTexFunc )
00211                  texCoord = tce->get(point, normal);
00212          else
00213          {
00214                  texCoord[0] = 0.0;
00215                  texCoord[1] = 0.0;
00216          }
00217 
00218         pv.setPoint( point );
00219         pv.setNormal( normal );
00220         pv.setTextureCoords( texCoord );
00221         shapeVertex( &pv );
00222 
00223          //P3
00224         point = SbVec3f( xMax.getValue(), 0.0, zMax.getValue() );
00225          if (useTexFunc )
00226                  texCoord = tce->get(point, normal);
00227          else
00228          {
00229                  texCoord[0] = 1.0;
00230                  texCoord[1] = 1.0;
00231          }
00232 
00233         pv.setPoint( point );
00234         pv.setNormal( normal );
00235         pv.setTextureCoords( texCoord );
00236         shapeVertex( &pv );
00237 
00238          //P4
00239         point = SbVec3f( xMax.getValue(), 0.0, zMin.getValue() );
00240          if (useTexFunc )
00241                  texCoord = tce->get(point, normal);
00242          else
00243          {
00244                  texCoord[0] = 0.0;
00245                  texCoord[1] = 1.0;
00246          }
00247 
00248         pv.setPoint( point );
00249         pv.setNormal( SbVec3f( 0.0, -1.0, 0.0 ) );
00250         pv.setTextureCoords( texCoord );
00251         shapeVertex( &pv );
00252 
00253          endShape();
00254 
00255 }
